body_html: If anyone is still running into the same problem (like I did few days ago) - it turns out to be perfectly possible to build bazel-0.4.1 and then build tensorflow 0.12rc0 from source on CentOS6.5, with glibc-2.12. However, some tricks are needed.
body_text: If anyone is still running into the same problem (like I did few days ago) - it turns out to be perfectly possible to build bazel-0.4.1 and then build tensorflow 0.12rc0 from source on CentOS6.5, with glibc-2.12. However, some tricks are needed.
body: If anyone is still running into the same problem (like I did few days ago) - it turns out to be perfectly possible to build bazel-0.4.1 and then build tensorflow 0.12rc0 from source on CentOS6.5, with glibc-2.12. However, [some tricks](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/110#issuecomment-265431453) are needed.
